singleProjects.title: QuickFit
singleProjects.description: A fitness tracking web app that allows users to log workouts, monitor progress, and stay fit.
coreFeatures: Personalized fitness plans and progress tracking
Workout routines and meal plans tailored to individual goals
Community support with forums and challenges
E-Shop for fitness-related products
Health and fitness calculators (e.g., BMI, calories burned)
Motivational articles and content
Subscription-based premium features
challenges: Creating personalized content for users based on fitness goals
Building an interactive and engaging community platform
Maintaining accurate data tracking and analytics for users
futurePlans: Integrate wearables like fitness trackers to sync workout data
Introduce live streaming for fitness classes
Expand the e-shop with more fitness products and tools

singleProjects.title: Le CelesteBD
singleProjects.description: Le CelesteBD is a full-stack restaurant web application for browsing menus, placing orders, making reservations, and processing payments securely. Admins can manage users, food items, reservations, and track revenue with a powerful dashboard .
coreFeatures: JWT-based role authentication (User, Admin)
Browse and search full food menu with categories
Add to cart and place online food orders
Make table reservations with preferred time and date
Stripe-powered secure payment processing
View and cancel orders and reservation requests
Customers access a personalized user dashboard
Admins manage users, food items, reservations, and payments
Revenue tracking with Recharts-based visual dashboard
Interactive UI using Swiper, SweetAlert2, and Lottie
Mobile responsive and clean UI with Tailwind CSS
Email notifications for order and reservation updates
SEO-friendly routing with React Router DOM
challenges: Implementing secure JWT-based role authentication and protected routes
Integrating Stripe for seamless payment flows and managing webhooks
Building a real-time reservation and order system with admin controls
Creating a responsive, animated UI with smooth form validation and feedback
futurePlans: Add multi-language support for broader user accessibility
Implement push/email notifications for order and reservation updates
Enable customer reviews and ratings for food items and service
Integrate advanced analytics for admin insights and sales trends

singleProjects.title: Skill Match
singleProjects.description: SkillMatch is a job placement platform connecting clients and freelancers, allowing job posting, bidding, and secure role-based access. It features job filtering, personalized dashboards, and real-time bidding workflows.
coreFeatures: Job posting, editing, and deletion for clients
Freelancers can browse listings, place bids, and track job status
Job search and filtering by category, skills, budget, and date
Secure authentication with Firebase Auth, JWT, and real-time bidding workflows
challenges: Implementing secure role-based authentication with Firebase Auth and JWT
Handling real-time bidding workflows and job status updates
Designing an intuitive job search, filtering system, and ensuring performance with large job listings
futurePlans: Integrate advanced job matching algorithms for better freelancer-client pairing
Add in-app messaging and notifications for smoother communication
Implement a rating and review system for freelancers and clients

singleProjects.title: Job Hunts
singleProjects.description: A streamlined job hunting platform to post jobs, apply for opportunities, and track your applicationsâ€”all in one place.
coreFeatures: Job posting and management
Application tracking
User job activity dashboard
challenges: User role and data consistency management

singleProjects.title: Coffee Store
singleProjects.description: CoffeeStore is a full-stack app where users can add, update, and remove coffee items, and manage user data with Firebase Auth and MongoDB.
coreFeatures: Coffee item management
User account control
Secure authentication
challenges: Securely managing coffee and user data operations
Handling ObjectId queries and responsive UI with modals
futurePlans: Implement admin dashboard and coffee analytics
Add image upload and dark mode support

singleProjects.title: NewsWave
singleProjects.description: NewsWave is a news aggregation platform that categorizes articles by topic, allowing users to explore the latest headlines. It features dynamic UI elements using React and Firebase for backend services.
coreFeatures: Categorized news articles by topic (e.g., Sports, Technology, Politics)
Real-time updates and article fetching with Firebase integration
Dynamic UI with smooth scrolling using React Marquee and Fast Marquee
Search and filter articles by category and keywords, responsive design
challenges: Handling real-time news updates and ensuring efficient data fetching from Firebase
Designing a smooth and responsive UI with dynamic marquee and scrolling elements
Implementing an intuitive search and filter system for users to easily browse categories
futurePlans: Integrate personalized news recommendations based on user interests
Add user authentication for saving favorite articles and preferences
Implement push notifications for breaking news and real-time updates
